d8b78223-6685-4731-b0a1-58e6d1986596.description: Never has it been more important to be able to think deeply, and critically to solve problems, develop new ideas and perspectives. Critical and creative thinking is an essential capability for students to develop for their learning now and into the future. The earner of this credential has a demonstrated ability to design and assess students ability to connect to the purpose of their learning, pose questions, use reasoning and meta-cognition to solve authentic problems.
d8b78223-6685-4731-b0a1-58e6d1986596.name: Critical and Creative Thinking

badge_template_activities.title: By completing a project and unit design, the earner of this credential has a demonstrated ability to have an impact on student critical and creative thinking capability through the design of learning tasks, utilising practical teaching approaches which evidence student learning and using technology effectively by setting and evaluating professional learning goals, engaging in educator collaboration and reflecting on professional practice.

9dc8dbc4-2670-47dc-a931-3226f783f0a1.description: To meet the demands of a changing world, individuals require initiative and self-awareness to identify their own strengths and preferred ways of working. Through supporting learners to developing both personal and professional insight into their performance, they are provided with an opportunity to develop resilience and grit in achieving long-term personal, learning and career goals to experience self-efficacy and ultimately, fulfillment in their lives.
9dc8dbc4-2670-47dc-a931-3226f783f0a1.name: Self-Directed Learning

badge_template_activities.title: By completing the assessment and unit design, the earner of this credential has a demonstrated ability to have an impact on student self-directed learning and personal capability through learning design and assessment that empowers learners to direct their own learning, plan their work, use feedback to reflect on their learning progress and overcome challenges in achieving their goals, demonstrating resilience and grit.

85ccd4fb-f882-402b-a349-b7ce9c95a705.description: Being able to connect with people from diverse cultural, social and religious backgrounds is essential for living in a globalised world. By understanding the diverse perspectives of others, learners can develop beliefs and attitudes about culture and the impact that diversity has on society. By engaging with ideas and solutions that promote community and cohesion, learners become effective global citizens, with a personal and collective responsibility to the world in which they live.
85ccd4fb-f882-402b-a349-b7ce9c95a705.name: Raising Global Citizens

badge_template_activities.title: Educators who have been awarded this badge have demonstrated that they have enabled learners to; explore their own and others' beliefs, values and behaviour, taught diverse experiences that on impact human connections, supported learners to reflect on the impact of diversity in a globalised world and helped them to generate ideas and solutions to promote community cohesion demonstrating citizenship on a local, national and global level.

63f6a581-c7a6-4271-bf47-773b37ae4a15.description: Being able to effectively work with others to develop solutions and new ideas is a highly valuable skillset in today’s world. Creating a culture of collaboration in any learning environment starts with the student. Empowering learner collaboration starts with understanding values, purpose and personal strengths which in turn, allows deeper empathy and understanding of other perspectives to engage in problem solving, conflict resolution to design powerful shared solutions and outcomes.
63f6a581-c7a6-4271-bf47-773b37ae4a15.name: Collaborative Problem-Solving

badge_template_activities.title: By completing the assessment and unit design, the earner of this credential has a demonstrated ability to have an impact on student skills of collaboration and social capability through learning design and assessment by enabling emotional intelligence, collaborative problem solving, overcoming challenges and developing personal insight about own and others performance.

71766225-c82c-4c1d-bf39-23d033b12793.description: Developing a more sustainable world socially, economically and environmentally require ethical decision making from everyone across the planet. Analysing ethical issues from range of perspectives allows them to discover the human-centred nature of ethics and the complexity of real-world ethical dilemmas. By being provided with the opportunity to demonstrate ethical decision making in practice means that learners develop awareness of the impact they have on real-world situations and solutions.
71766225-c82c-4c1d-bf39-23d033b12793.name: Cultivating Ethical Decision Makers

badge_template_activities.title: By completing the assessment and unit design, the earner of this credential has a demonstrated ability to have an impact on student skills of ethical capability through learning design and assessment by enabling empathy, real-world problem solving, analysis of ethical concepts and issues and applying ethical reasoning and decision-making.

26a23576-30f1-440d-8bad-0ca8b945ba0b.description: Participants have demonstrated an understanding of educational trends disrupting education, developed an understanding of what future capabilities look like in their school context and create highly impactful strategies for empowering educators and rapid upskilling for learning innovation. School leaders have clarity about what it looks like to empower future capable learners at their school and a roadmap for leading innovation in their own school context.
26a23576-30f1-440d-8bad-0ca8b945ba0b.name: Leading Future Capable Learners

badge_template_activities.title: Using Design Thinking educational leaders have designed a strategic plan for delivering on future capabilities in their school context. This includes collecting primary and secondary data to discover the problem they are solving, developing a clear problem statement and designing learning innovations that can be delivered with impact measures and celebration of achievement.

e29702df-4b72-4321-bbf5-0c6af4219aa1.description: Solving the worlds 'wicked' problems is in the hands of young people today. Discovering the authentic opportunities that exists for real people using human-centred design is at the heart of real-world problem solving. When learners take-action on their designed solution and reflect on the extent to which their solution delivers tangible benefits and outcomes, they understand the full extent to which they can create real-world change.
e29702df-4b72-4321-bbf5-0c6af4219aa1.name: Building Real-World Problem Solvers

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the micro-credential have scaffolded and gathered evidence of their impact on learning progression through enabling their students to discover real world problems, define the problem they are solving, create opportunities for collaborative ideation and developing solutions and linking the evidence of student innovation.

e06422cd-7147-4809-837b-8f030dde5437.description: Never has it been more important to be able to think deeply, and critically to solve problems, develop new ideas and perspectives. Critical and creative thinking is an essential capability for students to develop for their learning now and into the future. The earner of this credential has a demonstrated leadership capability through strategic thinking, coaching and demonstrating bet practice learning design for student critical and creative thinking.
e06422cd-7147-4809-837b-8f030dde5437.name: Leading Critical and Creative Thinking

badge_template_activities.title: By completing this leadership course, the earner of this credential has a demonstrated ability to have an impact on educator Professional Learning supporting student critical and creative thinking capability through the design of learning tasks, utilising practical teaching approaches which evidence student learning and using technology effectively by setting and evaluating professional learning goals, engaging in educator collaboration and reflecting on professional practice.
